forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. Northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. East wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 64. East southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. East southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of smoke. Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. East wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of smoke before 7am, then patchy fog between 7am and 8am, then a slight chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 83. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
